issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Currently, iOS only checks for custom fonts in {{Resources}} and Android checks in {{Resources/fonts}}. We need to make sure that both platforms are checking both places. For iOS this will have to happen during build.

*NOTE:* This issue may only affect simulator but will have an influence on how TIMOB-7824 is resolved.

h4. Testing
----

You will need to build an app with custom fonts in {{Resources/fonts}}, and follow the https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/Custom+Fonts instructions (if necessary; custom font building may be fixed before this ticket)
fields.summary: iOS: Place fonts in Resources/fonts for Android parity

comments.body: iOS, Mobile Web, and soon Android builds will allow fonts to live anywhere in the resources directory, thus this ticket is no longer applicable.
Closing ticket as the issue won't fix.
